answers.answer: I am not a physican, but if you are going to a gastroenterologist he will know waht parasites to look for .  I wish you luck tomorrow.

question: You proposed a solution to my entry: Stomach Ache in my Child with Diabetes, your help please...(Below).We are meeting with the doctor tomorrow and was wondering if you kow the exact "bug" that your friend's child had so we might order up tests for it? Thanks.
title: Looking to reconnect with JDRF - TEAM - CDB
